"In this game, you will play against computer(s). You will play with the color Yellow. 
To start the game, click on the dice. If your result is 6, you will be able to click on a pawn of your color. After each dice throw, your pawn will move accordingly.
When your pawn has reached the end of the board, it needs to move onto the finish line. To reach the first case you need to get a 1, then for the second case a 2â€¦ To move out of the board and finish it's play, you need to roll a 6 once your horse is on the last case of the finish line. 
The winner is the first player to get their four pawn up the finish line and out of the board. 
Hope you enjoy !"
"Welcome to Escape Dungeon. Please choose the difficulty"

"Game Rules : 
Move to the hearts to win hp and to weapons to win pa, use them to kill monsters. Getting a gold coin and killing a monster will earn you 10 points. 
Each 50 points you move up one level and the difficulty increases.
New weapons appear every four levels, and new monsters every two levels 
The round arrows will earn you exchange points, shake your phone or click on the text "Pt Exchange" to use them, this will redistribute the cards. 
Be careful, you can only get 2 of them saved and you can't use them twice in a row. 
Have a good game !"
